items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress perfect
items.body: Love the style, was more then I wanted to spend but not to high of a price. Loved the color, quality of the dress is great. I wear a size 2 or 4, ordered a small and it fits perfectly. It light weight and flows and super cute. Transparency is fine can not see through it. Read more
items.author: Jeff/Susan Hornock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress for Christmas season
items.body: NO POCKETS. It's 100% rayon and wrinkles very easily. Because of the way it was designed to have the creases and waves in the flow of it, it made it a little more stubborn to iron. But it's beautiful and I received a lot of compliments on it. I'm an XL, 16/18, and I bought the XL and it gave me enough room to feel comfortable in (I carry my weight in my lower gut, so the flow of it hides it well). Even though the top is specifically stretchy, if I had any bigger boobs I probably would have had to return it for a size up. My bosom feels a little scrunched in the top of the dress. I'm a 40/42 C for that reference. Read more
items.author: Julia Rines

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkle alert!!
items.body: Dress arrived in an open bag, folded and extremely wrinkled, with removed tags that fell to the floor upon opening the dress. The size large fit decently and for someone with a shorter torso than my long one, probably would have hung right and looked good. If I wanted to keep it, I would have reordered an XL just to get more room in the torso and a little less tight in my already small bust (I am 5'7" and 155 lb). But for me, the fabric being very wrinkled even out of the bag makes me not want to deal with it. Too high maintenance. If you don't mind ironing, it is a cute dress! Read more
items.author: BMOM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice casual and dressy dress
items.body: Nice color, nice material, a little tight on the bust area but not too tight, overall I like the dress. Read more
items.author: Cheri Forsyth

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's just ok
items.body: A bit disappointed that the Amazon picture didn't show the Pros: I don't need to hem it. I don't need to cuff the sleeves. The skirt looks it does in the picture. It looks ok for a last minute Easter dress for church. It is comfortable to wear. Cons: The Amazon picture shows a smooth top, but this is a shirred, stretchy top. When extending my arms in front of my body, the sleeves pull up by about two inches. I doubt I would recommend anyone buy this for a nice event. Read more
items.author: lwilson

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Totally returned the dress!!
items.body: Color looked faded and was so wrinkled liked it had been tied on knots for a long time. Read more
items.author: Kathy Reynolds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a growing bump!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress. I ended up purchasing for my fall family photos. Currently pregnant but was not sure how big my belly would be by the time I scheduled these photos. The medium fit is true to size with room for a growing belly. Color was true to the pictures posted. And the mock top allows for ease of different chest sizes. Read more
items.author: Allison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like in the photo
items.body: This blue is a perfect color for my eyes. It fits true to size and is very becoming. As described. The material is light and drapes nicely. It does take a wrinkle fairly easily. It feels like rayon and hangs like rayon. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkpink, Hotpink, Rust, Pureblack, Lightblue, Royalblue, Rose, Ginger, Coffee, Dustyblue, Armygreen, Watermelonred, Darkgreen, Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
